title: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos says company will support lawsuit against Trump's immigration order
text: The Washington Post , which is owned by Bezos, reported that Bezos wrote in an internal email to Amazon employees Monday that company lawyers have prepared a "declaration of support" for the suit. The Post reported that the letter says company lawyers "are working other legal options as well."
summary:
The Washington Post , which is owned by Bezos, reported that Bezos wrote in an internal email to Amazon employees Monday that company lawyers have prepared a "declaration of support" for the suit.
The Post reported that the letter says company lawyers "are working other legal options as well."
